```{r setup}
library(ErasmusMCworkshop)
```

```{r countPersons}
connectionDetails <- Eunomia::getEunomiaConnectionDetails()

ErasmusMCworkshop::countPersons(
  connectionDetails,
  cdmSchema = "main"
)
```

```{r countDrug}
ErasmusMCworkshop::countDrug(
  connectionDetails,
  cdmSchema = "main",
  drugName = "celecoxib"
)
```

```{r countDrugCondition}
ErasmusMCworkshop::countDrugCondition(
  connectionDetails,
  cdmSchema = "main",
  drugName = "celecoxib",
  conditionId = 192671
)
```
